 Ravaged is an intense online multiplayer first-person shooter. Ravaged i
 designed with a heavy focus on vehicular combat taking place on vast map
 that will have you strategically duking it out on land and in air with  
 over 40 vehicles and weapons. Placed within a competitive team-based    
 environment created specifically for the PC, Ravaged is set in a post-  
 apocalyptic world that was ripped apart by cataclysmic climate change.  
                                                                         
 The Ravaged Story:                                                      
 The Scavengers are an overpowering band of murderous savages hell-bent o
 taking every last inch of land and every critical resource for themselve
 They will stop at nothing. Their success seems certain unless someone ca
 rise up against them. The Resistance is the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s last best hope and  
 humankindÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only chance to restore civilization. Days before the        
 Apocalypse, these freedom fighters were able to seek shelter deep below 
 the Earth, gathering just enough to survive. Finally, they are ready to 
 emerge and rebuild the planet. But itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a new world, overrun by the     
 miscreants and madmen, warlords and hapless refugees. Only the most sava
